sentence.Network_en: He walked aimlessly along street after street, head down and shoulders bowed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他低着头、垂着肩，漫无目的地走过一条条街道。
我漫无目的地到处游逛。

sentence.Network_en: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... aimless 无目的的 aimlessly 漫无目的地 ain't 不是.

wandering aimlessly without ties to a place or community .没有漫无目的的流浪。

entry.def: A person or activity that is aimless has no clear purpose or plan.

example.ex: Peters had been adrift and aimless...
example.tran: 彼得斯曾经漫无目的地四处漂泊。

example.ex: After several hours of aimless searching they were getting low on fuel.
example.tran: 在几个小时漫无目的的搜寻之后，他们快没燃料了。

auth_sentence.content: With two hours to kill, I pootled about aimlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: With two hours to kill, I pootled about aimlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With two hours to kill, I pootled about aimlessly.

auth_sentence.content: That has left man to aimlessly wonder around the ring.
auth_sentence.res_content: That has left man to aimlessly wonder around the ring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That has left man to aimlessly wonder around the ring.

auth_sentence.content: While one trio cycles, the other two species vie aimlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: While one trio cycles, the other two species vie aimlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While one trio cycles, the other two species vie aimlessly.

sentences.en: For the rest of the morning he searched aimlessly through the town.
sentences.cn: 上午余下的时间里 ，他在镇上漫无目标地四处搜寻。

sentences.en: Ann was strolling along aimlessly when I brought her up short by calling her name from the other side of the street.
sentences.cn: 安正在街上漫无目标地闲逛,我从街对面叫她,她便停了下来。
